dsOverview.title: GEWEX NASA Water Vapor Project (NVAP)

summary.p: A five year (1988-1992) total and layered global water vapor data set on 1x1 degree grids. This set is derived from radiosonde observations, TOVS and SSMI data. Precipitable water cotent (PWC), layered PWC and cloud liquid water path (LWP) are the main products with supplemental products of each data source. The cloud LWP is over global oceans only. Daily, monthly, yearly and 5-day averaged grids are available.
